CHAT.comment: the room is small , about ten feet square , on one side of the room is a bookcase , on the wall at rightangles to the bookcase wall is a desk , there are two easy chairs in the room. at the start of the recording June and her mother are sitting in the center of the floor playing with a toy train.
at the start of the session June and her mother are sitting in the center of the floor looking at a book. mother is reading from the book.

u.a: June drops the book and gets a toy phone out of the toybox , June turns to her mother .
she hands the base of the toy phone to her mother .
mother puts the phone to her ear .
mother offers the phone to June , June backs away and looks at the camera .
mother goes over to get June and bring her back to the center .
June reaches out and touches the book .
June stamps her feet and cries .
June slaps the book and cries .
June takes the book and throws it across the room .
June cries and wanders off into the kitchen area which ajoins the room .
June is still in the kitchen , she cries .
June cries . mother picks her up and carries her back into the room .
mother returns with some cheerios in a bowl . mother returns to the kitchen .
June begins to eat the cheerios and a cookie that she brought back from the kitchen with her .
no response , June hands a piece of cookie to mother and feeds her .
June holds out a second piece of cookie to her mother and then puts it in her own mouth .
mother holds out the bowl of cheerios .
no response , mother holds out a box and June beats it like a drum .
June leans forward and eats it , silence , mother holds out a piece of cookie .
mother holds out a piece of cookie .
silence during which mother gets the shapesorter and puts it in front of June , June continues to eat .
no response , silence during which mother tips out the shapes . June continues to eat . she holds out a piece of cookie and feeds her mother .
June holds out the cookie and mum attempts to take it .
silence during which June tips the cheerios out of the bowl and puts it on her head . her mother taps the bowl .
silence during which June hands the bowl to her mother . mother holds the bowl and June puts her head in it and ends up wearing it like a hat again .
the bowl falls off and June goes to get one of her overshoes .
mother attempts to put the overshoes on June's foot .
June gets the other shoe , hands it to her mother and then holds up her foot .
mother has put both shoes on now .

mother sets up the shapesorter , June stares into space and eats cheerios , after a short while June picks up a shape and attempts to put it through the wrong hole . mother turns the box looking for the correct hole .
mother pokes her finger through a hole .
June puts the shape through the hole .
June weaves her foot in the air .
June leaves the shoe on and waves her foot in the air again .
mother removes the overshoe , mother pats June's sneaker .
silence during which June sits with a boot on her hand . then she attempts to put a shape into the shapesorter .
June holds the shape out to her mother . mother takes it .

silence during which mother turns the shapesorter and puts the shape through the correct hole . June stares at the camera , at Roy , and around the room . mother carries on putting shapes into the shapesorter . June turns to her mother and offers her a piece of cookie .
before mother can get the cookie , June pops it in her own mouth .
silence during which mother continues to put shapes into the shapesorter and June pokes her fingers through the holes in the box . mother hands a shape to June .
silence during which June puts the shape through a hole , June carries on playing with the shapes and peers at the camera .
June picks up her overshoe again , silence .
mother puts June's overshoe back on again .
silence during which June plays with the cheerios and offers one to mother .
mother offers a cheerio to June .
silence during which mother looks around and then gets a tray of stacking blocks .
silence during which mother builds a tower of blocks , which June then knocks down .
mother builds a second tower and June knocks it down again .
does June want to build a tower ?
no response , mother builds several towers and June knocks them down .
silence , June picks up a shape and mother gets the shapesorter .
a ploy to get June to face the camera
they return to shapesorting . June hands a shape to her mother .
June is singing to herself as she plays .
mother turns the shapesorter and June attempts to put a stacking block into it .
June begins to dig in the toybox .
June pulls a book out of the toybox . mother points to the front of it .
June puts the book on the floor and opens it .
June turns to look at her toys .
silence , rubber duck is tossed into the playing area by the camera operator .
no response , June picks up another book .
mother reads the book to June . June is sitting on mother's knee .
June hands another book to her mother , mother holds the book out so June can see it .
June looks around for the duck again , mother meant the one in the book .
mother lifts the book and shows the page to June .
June continues to look for the rubber duck on the floor .
June picks up the toy phone and hands it to her mother and then carries on looking around for something . the duck ? .
June slaps the phone away from herself .
June slams the handset on to the floor .
June throws the whole toy phone into the corner .

silence during which June eats some more cheerios . mother digs into the toybox and produces a tennis ball . June has wandered across to an easy chair and is climbing on it . mother drops the ball on to the chair .
June picks up the ball and hands it back to mother .
mother hands the ball back to June .
June drops the ball on the floor and climbs down from the chair .
mother hands the ball back to June .
June throws the ball to mother . mother hands it back .
June throws the ball to her mother again . mother returns it once more .
June hands the ball to mother , June picks up a toy train .
June looks at the train again .
mother has not seen the train , she thinks the ball is still the topic .
silence during which June takes the toy train apart .
silence during which mother picks up the pieces of the train . June walks towards the camera .
June walks back to her mother who is fixing the train .
June ignores her mother and begins to eat more cheerios .
June disappears into the kitchen and comes back with more cheerios .
mother stands Mr Potatohead on the floor in front of June . June reaches out for it and begins to dismantle it .
June ignores her mother's question , tips the cheerios out of the bowl on to the floor and then hands the bowl to her mother . she hangs on to Mr Potatohead with her other hand .
June puts the bowl on potatohead's head . silence during which June is eating cheerios .
June puts the bowl on her own head again .
silence during which mother reassembles Mr Potatohead
mother puts a hat on Mr Potatohead
mother puts the rebuilt Mr Potatohead in front of June .
silence during which June dismantles the Mr Potatohead again . she hands the hat to her mother .
June holds out Mr Potatohead to mother .
mother puts the hat back on the toy . June removes it and hands the hat back to her mother .
mother hands the hat back to June again , June gives it straight back again
June holds out Mr Potatohead , mother puts the hat back on it .
June takes Mr Potatohead back again .
June puts the hat back on again and then begins to dismantle Mr Potatohead .
silence , June hands the hat to mother .
June hands the Mr Potatohead body to mother .
June takes the nose and dumps it on the floor , mother retrieves it and replaces it . June removes it again .
mother replaces an ear , June removes it .
mother puts a pipe into the toy's mouth .
June begins to swing Mr Potatohead back and to .
June begins to dismantle the toy .
mother moves the Mr Potatohead pieces so that June is facing the camera .
June looks at her mother and then at the bookshelves .
mother holds up the rubber duck .
June slaps the duck to the floor and beats on it . she cries .
June picks up the Mr Potatohead body and begins to look around her .
the pieces are on the bookshelf .
no response , June plays with the pieces and then looks up to the shelves again .
silence , June tips out the cheerios which mother has reassembled in the bowl , mother reaches for the bowl .
mother moves the cheerios over to the camera side of June .
June picks up the Mr Potatohead and hands the hat to mother .
mother puts the hat on the body .
June holds out the Mr Potatohead hat .
mother takes the hat and replaces it on Mr Potatohead .
mother picks up the nose as well as a shoe .
mother puts a shoe on the body .
June hands a cheerio to mother and feeds her .
June hands another cheerio to mother and feeds her again .
mother picks up a cheerio to feed June but June is already helping herself .
silence , mother picks up Mr Potatohead and the hat .
mother begins to reassemble Mr Potatohead with different parts . June is singing to herself .
mother looks for the other ear , finds it and replaces it .
mother stands the Mr Potatohead in front of June .
June removes the mouth and hands it to mother .
June removes the mouth and puts it on the floor .
June turns to mother and gives her the Mr Potatohead .
June grabs hold of Mr Potatohead and gives a long cry , mother gets the other mouth .
silence . June removes the mouth and the pipe .
June begins to disassemble Mr Potatohead .
June attempts to replace the hat .
June hands the hat to her mother .
June holds Mr Potatohead while her mother reassembles it .
June picks up her overshoe . silence .
mother stands Mr Potatohead in front of June . no response .
June picks up the toy , puts it down and then removes and examines the pipe .
silence during which she removes the nose and then the mouth . June attempts to refit the pipe into the mouth . she looks up to the bookshelves again .
mother removes the overshoe from June's foot .
June sings to herself and begins to disassemble Mr Potatohead again .
mother picks up the pieces and begins to reassemble the toy .
mother stands the rebuilt Mr Potatohead in front of June
June begins to take the toy apart and then she looks at her mother .
mother begins to put the cheerios back in the bowl .
June puts the bowl on her head again and flips it off the back . silence during which June tips out the cheerios and begins to eat them off the rug .
mother replaces the bowl on June's head .
June flips it off her head and replaces it herself .
June picks up a book and hands it to her mother .
June dumps the book , mother points to the picture in the book .
silence , mother begins to play with a toy ladybird .
long silence during which June sneezes .
